Package by.epam.store.model.dao

Interface BaseDao<T>

Type Parameters:
T - entity
All Known Subinterfaces:
OrderDao, OrderProductConnectionDao, ProductCategoryDao, ProductDao, SupplyDao, UserDao
All Known Implementing Classes:
OrderDaoImpl, OrderProductConnectionDaoImpl, ProductCategoryDaoImpl, ProductDaoImpl, SupplyDaoImpl, UserDaoImpl
public interface BaseDao<T>
The root interface in the dao hierarchy

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void create​(T entity)
    Creates a new record in the corresponding database table
    java.util.List<T> findAll()
    Find all records in the corresponding database table
    boolean update​(T entity)
    Updates record in the corresponding database table

  • Method Details

    • create

      void create​(T entity) throws DaoException
      Creates a new record in the corresponding database table
      Parameters:
      entity - all data to create
      Throws:
      DaoException - if ConnectionPoolException or SQLException occur

    • update

      boolean update​(T entity) throws DaoException
      Updates record in the corresponding database table
      Parameters:
      entity - all data to update
      Returns:
      boolean true true if the record has been updated, else false
      Throws:
      DaoException - if ConnectionPoolException or SQLException occur

    • findAll

      java.util.List<T> findAll() throws DaoException
      Find all records in the corresponding database table
      Returns:
      List of entity
      Throws:
      DaoException - if ConnectionPoolException or SQLException occur
